#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
 
 
#define gc getchar_unlocked
int fi() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  int ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}
 
int main()
{
    char c, prev=127, max_char;
    int max=1 , streak=1;
    c=gc();
    prev=c;
    max_char=c;
    while((c=gc())!='\n'){
 
 
 
        if(prev==c){
            streak++;
        }
        else{
            streak=1;
        }
 
        if(max< streak){
            max = streak;
            max_char = c;
        }
        else
        if(max == streak){
            if(max_char>c){
                max_char = c;
            }
        }
 
        prev = c;
    }
    printf("%c\n%d",max_char,max);
 
    return 0;
}
